thread.title: Wynne
thread.title_full: Airline Ticket Centre.ca reviewed by Wynne

author: Wynne
title: Wynne
text: I had a senior travel consultant, Kari Pucci, help me with all my travel needs for an upcoming holiday. She answered all of my questions, shared her knowledge and suggestions and was so pleasant to deal with. I would highly recommend Kari and look forward to booking another holiday with her in the future!
